title.value: Let's Discuss Your Digital Transformation Journey

metaDescription.value: About Digital AI Garage: process digitization, automation, and integration.

description.value: We help organizations digitize and automate repeatable business processes using Microsoft Power Platform and Azure services. Our work focuses on practical transformation: faster decisions, visible workflows, reduced manual effort, and scalable operations.

title.value: How a typical Customer Communication starts

sections.question: What do you do ?
sections.answer: We enable organizations to digitize and automate their business processes.

sections.question: What kind of processes can be digitized ?
sections.answer:
Any structured, repeatable business process that involves multiple stakeholders, decision points, data capture, or approvals can be digitized.

Processes that:
- Involve multiple people or departments
- Require complex workflows or sequential approvals
- Need role-based or security-based access control
- Depend on manual data entry or paper-based documentation
- Require tracking, audit trails, or compliance monitoring
- Involve repetitive tasks that can be standardized
- Require integration across systems (ERP, CRM, HRMS, etc.)

sections.question: Is it only digitization ?
sections.answer:
No ‚Äî it goes beyond digitization. It involves Digitization, Automation, and Integration.

- Digitization converts manual or paper-based processes into structured digital workflows.
- Automation reduces human intervention by automatically triggering actions, approvals, notifications, and validations.
- Integration connects systems (ERP, CRM, finance, HR, etc.) so data flows seamlessly across platforms without duplication or manual re-entry.

sections.question: CRM, ERP is also a process, Can you create one as per my need ?
sections.answer:
Yes. In fact, few of our customers are already using our custom-built CRM solutions. 

- Our CRM systems are not only highly cost-effective, but also fully tailored to each organization‚Äôs specific processes, workflows, and reporting requirements. 
- We design them to align with your business model ‚Äî not the other way around.

sections.question: Which technology stack you use ?
sections.answer: Microsoft Power Platform, Azure Cloud Services & Open stack for frontend

sections.question: Why only Microsoft ?
sections.answer:
This was a deliberate strategic decision. Rather than spreading ourselves across multiple platforms, we chose to specialize in one enterprise-grade ecosystem. 
Microsoft provides a comprehensive, integrated platform. By going deep instead of wide, we deliver greater quality, faster execution, and more reliable outcomes for our clients.

sections.question: Ok,How can we begin our journey with you ?
sections.answer:
Start small
- Identify a simple, high-impact use case within your organization ‚Äî something manual, repetitive, or approval-driven. 
- We can rapidly build a focused solution to address that specific need.
- Once you see the value, gain confidence, and experience measurable results, we can gradually scale the solution ‚Äî expanding automation, integrations, and digital workflows across departments.
- Digital transformation doesn‚Äôt have to start big. It just has to start smart.

metaDescription.value: Customer case studies by Digital AI Garage showcasing digitization, automation, and integration outcomes.

description.value: Explore real implementations where we digitized manual workflows, reduced operational delays, and improved decision-making visibility.

items.title: üöÄ End-to-end digital transformation of enterprise business processes powered by Microsoft‚Äôs integrated technology stack.
items.aboutCustomer: Largest Design + Build House Redevelopment company in Delhi NCR
items.executiveSummary:
We delivered a comprehensive digital transformation solution for our client by designing and implementing an integrated business platform built on the Microsoft ecosystem. The objective was to replace fragmented systems with a centralized, scalable, and automation-driven architecture powered by Microsoft Power Platform, Azure, and Microsoft Dataverse.

The solution unified external customer portals, vendor portals, internal business applications s.a. CRM, Project Management, Customer Management, and enterprise automation workflows into a single secure Microsoft cloud environment.

Key outcomes included:

üîπDeployment of dynamic customer and vendor portals
üîπImplementation of custom CRM and business applications
üîπ30+ automated workflows using Power Automate
üîπCentralized data management using Microsoft Dataverse
üîπSeamless integration with website, IVR, WhatsApp, and Azure services
üîπEnterprise-grade security with Microsoft Entra
The transformation resulted in improved operational efficiency, better data visibility, enhanced customer engagement, and scalable cloud-based infrastructure.
items.problemStatement: Rising operating costs of existing SaaS CRM, fragmented workflows, and limited integration with other enterprise systems.
items.provideSolution:
We architected a layered digital ecosystem combining Azure services, Power Platform, and Dataverse as the core database.

üëâ (A) External-Facing Digital Portals

We implemented dynamic web portals hosted on Azure Static Web Apps, integrated securely with Dataverse at the backend. Following applications are built

1Ô∏è‚É£ Customer Portal
2Ô∏è‚É£ Vendor Portal
3Ô∏è‚É£ Internal Training Application

These portals were secured using Microsoft Entra (External Identity for Customers & Vendors) and connected to Dataverse for real-time data interaction.

Azure Functions were used for server-side processing, business logic execution, and API integrations.

üëâ (B) Centralized Data Platform

We implemented Microsoft Dataverse as the underlying enterprise database, ensuring:
Unified data model across departments
üîπ Role-based access control
üîπ Secure data storage
üîπ Structured business entities
üîπ Scalable cloud architecture
üîπ Dataverse enabled real-time synchronization between portals, internal apps, and automation workflows.

üëâ (C) Custom Business Applications (Power Apps)

For internal users, we developed custom model-driven and canvas apps using Power Apps, power automate & Microsoft Dataverse. Following applications are built

1Ô∏è‚É£Sales CRM
2Ô∏è‚É£Vendor Management Application
3Ô∏è‚É£Customer Management System
4Ô∏è‚É£Project Management System
5Ô∏è‚É£Procurement Management System

These interconnected applications replaced manual processes and siloed spreadsheets, providing centralized business control. Moreover, these applications are also connected to other systems as well for seamless integration. For example, CRM is integrated with Company‚Äôs website, social media channels, IVR for Lead capturing. It is also connected to WhatsApp vis Meta APIs for customer notifications

üëâ (D) Automation & Integration Layer

We implemented 30+ automated workflows using Power Automate, forming the automation and integration backbone of the system.

Key Automations included:

1Ô∏è‚É£Lead assignment workflows
2Ô∏è‚É£Approval processes
3Ô∏è‚É£WhatsApp Notifications to Customer
4Ô∏è‚É£HTML Email Notifications

üëâ (E) Azure Integration Architecture

Azure services were used for:

1Ô∏è‚É£Hosting static web apps
2Ô∏è‚É£Executing serverless logic through Azure Functions
3Ô∏è‚É£API integration via Azure APIM
4Ô∏è‚É£Microsoft Entra Home & External Tenant
5Ô∏è‚É£Azure Blob Storage
6Ô∏è‚É£Azure Communication Services (For Bulk Email Marketing)

items.benefits:
Reduced licensing costs by 70%.
Increased lead generation by 50%.
items.whatNext:
Closed deals are automatically transitioned into the project management system, triggering project creation within a separate application built on Power Apps, Power Automate, and Azure Functions.

Lost deals with future potential are automatically routed to a bulk marketing platform (developed using Power Apps, Power Automate, Azure Functions, and Azure Communication Services) for structured re-engagement campaigns.

items.title: üí° Transitioning from high-cost CRM SaaS platforms to scalable, cost-efficient custom CRM solutions powered by Power Apps, Power Automate, and Microsoft Dataverse.
items.aboutCustomer: Largest Design + Build House Redevelopment company in Delhi NCR
items.executiveSummary: End-to-end custom CRM development and Microsoft Power Platform implementation services, delivering a scalable Power Apps and Dataverse-based CRM solution that replaced legacy SaaS CRM systems. The platform seamlessly integrated social media channels, the company website, and company IVR as centralized lead sources, reduced operational costs by 70%, increased lead generation by 50%, and deployed 15+ business process automations to eliminate manual tasks and improve team productivity.
items.problemStatement: Rising operating costs of existing SaaS CRM, fragmented workflows, and limited integration with other enterprise systems.
items.provideSolution: Architected and deployed an end-to-end CRM platform leveraging Microsoft Power Apps, Power Automate, and Azure services. Integrated diverse lead channels (website, IVR, social media) into a unified system with automated lead assignment, digital approval workflows, and intelligent reporting. Implemented automated WhatsApp and email notifications to enhance customer engagement and response time. Inbound and outbound customer calls, including call recordings, are automatically associated with the relevant opportunity for complete interaction tracking.
items.benefits:
Reduced licensing costs by 70%.
Increased lead generation by 50%.
items.whatNext:
Closed deals are automatically transitioned into the project management system, triggering project creation within a separate application built on Power Apps, Power Automate, and Azure Functions.

Lost deals with future potential are automatically routed to a bulk marketing platform (developed using Power Apps, Power Automate, Azure Functions, and Azure Communication Services) for structured re-engagement campaigns.

items.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Digitizing paper-heavy approvals into a unified, automated workflow engine with real-time operational visibility.
items.aboutCustomer: Manufacturing and metals business with process-heavy operational workflows.
items.executiveSummary: Transitioned from manual, paper-heavy processes to a centralized digital approval system, significantly improving operational visibility and decision-making speed.
items.problemStatement: Manual documentation, phone-based coordination, and disconnected approvals caused slow decisions and limited visibility.
items.provideSolution: Built a custom digital platform to centralize approvals, automate repeatable steps, and enable real-time process tracking.
items.benefits: Faster decisions, better accountability, reduced manual follow-ups, and stronger operational control.
items.whatNext: Integrate the platform with adjacent business systems and scale adoption to more departments.
